section.title:
checks
printing individual
accounts payable
printing checks for Print A/P Check
section.para: To print an individual Check, select the "Print A/P Check" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing an individual Check, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Bank Account for the Check you want to print.
Specify the Check Number you want to print. Menu will list Checks from prepared Check Runs associated with the specified Bank Account.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without printing a Check, returning you to the application desktop.
